name: Shield Focus
text: You are skilled at deflecting blows with your shield.
benefit: Increase the AC bonus granted by any shield you are using by 1.
staminaText: When an attack is made against you while you are using a shield, you can spend up to 2 stamina points. If you do, the shield’s bonus to AC against that attack increases by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
mythicText: You’re a master of using your shield for protection.
mythicBenefit: Add your shield bonus and your shield’s enhancement bonus to your touch AC. As an immediate action, you can expend one use of mythic power to add your shield bonus and your shield’s enhancement bonus on a Fortitude or Ref lex save just before you roll it.
text_zh: 你善于用盾牌偏转攻击。
mythicText_zh: 你是利用盾牌保护自身的行家里手。
mythicBenefit_zh: 将你的盾牌加值以及你的盾牌的增强加值算入你的接触AC中。以直觉动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此将你的盾牌加值与你的盾牌的增强加值应用到1次你将要进行的强韧或反射豁免中。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用盾牌时，你可以在一次针对你的攻击做出后消耗至多2点耐力。如果你这样做了，对抗那次攻击的AC盾牌加值将会提升等同于你消耗的耐力。
